item.title: Tell me about Prophecy MUD
item.description: Prophecy MUD is a huge, text-based world (+121 original areas) run on heavily modified ROM 2.4 code. Like all traditional MUDs, Prophecy is completely devoid of graphics. This is a feature, not a bug! First-time MUD gamers will be surprised how very engrossing a text-based game can be. Prophecyâ€™s content and gaming style is based on the popular David Eddings fantasy series The Belgariad and The Malloreon. The books serve as the basis for choice of character race, class, and initial alignment.

item.title: Creating a New Theme
item.description: Introduction This tutorial will show you how to create a simple theme in Hugo. I assume that you are familiar with HTML, the bash command line, and that you are comfortable using Markdown to format content. I’ll explain how Hugo uses templates and how you can organize your templates to create a theme. I won’t cover using CSS to style your theme. We’ll start with creating a new site with a very basic template.
